tool_description: Creates detailed stitch patterns for knitting, crocheting, or weaving projects with customizable repeats and complexity levels.

pattern_category.description: Pattern type (cables, lace, colorwork, textured, basic)

stitch_count.description: Number of stitches in pattern repeat (4-100)

row_count.description: Number of rows in pattern repeat (2-50)

include_chart.description: Whether to include visual chart representation

error_messages: Unsupported craft type: Use one of [knitting, crochet, weaving].
Invalid pattern category: Use one of [cables, lace, colorwork, textured, basic].
Stitch count out of range: Must be between 4 and 100 stitches.
Row count out of range: Must be between 2 and 50 rows.
Invalid difficulty level: Use one of [beginner, intermediate, advanced].
usage: Specify craft_type, pattern_category, stitch_count, and row_count to generate a complete stitch pattern with written instructions and optional chart.

pattern_name.description: Generated name for the stitch pattern

written_instructions.description: Row-by-row written instructions for the pattern

stitch_abbreviations.description: List of stitch abbreviations used in the pattern

chart_available.description: Whether a visual chart is included
